document.full_text: gale-force winds whipped flames from a stubborn wildfire in west texas out of deep mountain canyons and back in the direction of populated areas on tuesday, prompting an evacuation of some nearby homes.
document.title: wildfire roars out of west texas canyons to menace homes
lines_and_colors: gale-force winds whipped flames from a stubborn wildfire in west texas out of deep mountain canyons and back in the direction of populated areas on tuesday, prompting an evacuation of some nearby homes.
